hero.name: David Sajitz
hero.tagline: Fullstack developer with a passion for modern web technologies

about.title: About Me
about.intro_1: Hi! I'm David, a passionate fullstack developer from Germany. I work with modern web technologies and build websites, web apps and digital solutions for a wide range of requirements.
about.intro_2: My main focus is development with React and Next.js, but I'm also experienced with backend technologies, WordPress and network engineering. I'm always learning and excited about new technologies and approaches.

projects.title: Projects
projects.description: A selection of my past work and projects.

blog.title: Blog
blog.description: Articles and thoughts on web development and technology.

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: Have a project in mind or just want to say hello? Feel free to send me an email or connect with me.
